CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(External_Account__r.Street__c), '', External_Account__r.Street__c + ', ') + IF(ISBLANK(External_Account__r.Suburb__c), '', External_Account__r.Suburb__c + ', ') + IF(ISBLANK(External_Account__r.State__c ), '', External_Account__r.State__c + ', ') + IF(ISBLANK(External_Account__r.Post_Code__c), '', External_Account__r.Post_Code__c + ', ') + IF(ISBLANK(External_Account__r.Country__c), '', External_Account__r.Country__c)
CustomField.label: Booking System Account Address
